name: bgro's Anki Plugins
tagline: Some plugins for the Anki Flashcard Software
body:
### What this is all about

[Anki](http://ankisrs.net/) is a great program for learning flashcards. It allows customization via
Python-based plugins. This web page documents my plugins for Anki.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
